headline: More Americans Are Betting On Crypto, Private Equity And Alternatives, Skipping The Old 60/40
summary: American investors are rewriting what it means to invest successfully in today's market environment; two-thirds say they look beyond stocks and bonds to alternative assets to diversify and tailor their portfolios, according to Charles Schwab (NASDAQ:SCHW). That's a significant shift away from the foundational approach of counting on stocks and bonds to build an investment portfolio.
